      • collinear

        public boolean collinear(double p1x,
                         double p1y,
                         double p2x,
                         double p2y,
                         double p3x,
                         double p3y)
        Checks if the points of a triangle are collinear
        Parameters:
        p1x - x coordinate of point 1
        p1y - y coordinate of point 1
        p2x - x coordinate of point 2
        p2y - y coordinate of point 2
        p3x - x coordinate of point 3
        p3y - y coordinate of point 3
        Returns:
        validation of collinearity of points
